comment.author: 41862196@N06
comment._content:
I may be wrong, but I'm under the impression that the Maud Palmer has been converted to storage.

The yard arms, sails, and associated rigging are gone.  Also, the hull has been painted white.

I guess in 1910, steam was kicking maritine Bootay.  I wonder what happend to her?

comment.author: 41862196@N06
comment._content: Well, I look like a butt! www.flickr.com/photos/field_museum_library/4987035924/ This picture shows everything is intact. It's just a form of rigging with which I'm not familiar... never mind!
